nodes.text: Camp Four was a prison camp established by the Trade Federation during their invasion and occupation of the planet Naboo, located in Theed's largest market square and designated for government personnel such as Theed Royal Palace staff and members of the Royal Naboo Security Forces. Queen Padmé Amidala and her inner circle were sentenced to Camp Four, but they were rescued by Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Gungan exile Jar Jar Binks while being escorted to the camp by the Trade Federation Droid Army. After Amidala's escape from the planet, several members of her staff who remained behind were imprisoned there, including Mariek Panaka, Tonra, and handmaidens Saché and Yané, as was Naboo Palace Guard member Perosei.
